briefTitle: A Phase II Safety and Tolerability Study of Bevacizumab When Added to Single-agent Chemotherapy to Treat Patient With Breast Cancer Metastatic to Brain
officialTitle: A Phase II Safety and Tolerability Study of Avastin When Added to Single-agent Chemotherapy to Treat Patient With Breast Cancer Metastatic to Brain
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Safety and Tolerability Will be Assessed According to Standard (CTCAE Version 3.0) Toxicity Reporting Criteria.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female, 18+, with evaluable metastatic breast cancer and stable brain metastases
* Must have received definitive radiotherapy
* No evidence, or history of, central nervous system hemorrhage
* Adequate organ and hematological function

Exclusion Criteria:

* Active infection, non-healing wound, or history of any bleeding diathesis or coagulopathy
* Uncontrolled hypertension, congestive heart failure, peripheral vascular disease
